price: «እናንተንም ከአላህ ሌላ የምትግገዙትንም እርቃለሁ፡፡ ጌታዬንም እግገዛለሁ፡፡ ጌታዬን በመገዛት የማፍር አለመኾኔን እከጅላለሁ፡፡»
arabic: وَأَعۡتَزِلُكُمۡ وَمَا تَدۡعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَأَدۡعُواْ رَبِّي عَسَىٰٓ أَلَّآ أَكُونَ بِدُعَآءِ رَبِّي شَقِيّٗا

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-aʿtazilukum wamā tadʿūna min dūni al-lahi wa-adʿū rabbī ʿasā allā akūna biduʿāi rabbī shaqiyyan
